original_text: Jesus replied, ‘Go back to John. Tell him what you have been hearing. Also, tell him what you have been seeing.
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 너희가 가서 듣고 보는 것을 요한에게 알리되

sentences.original_text: Tell him what you have been hearing
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 듣고 있는 것을 그에게 알려라

sentences.original_text: Also, tell him what you have been seeing
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 너희가 보고 있는 것도 그에게 알려라
